item.title: 10 tips for time management
item.description: 10 tips for time management Time management is the process of planning and organizing how to spend the hours in a day to effectively accomplish tasks and meet goals.

item.title: How to remain focused towards your goal?
item.description: How to remain focused towards your goal? Staying focused on your goals can be challenging, but there are several strategies that can help:
